channel.title: Compression on IEvangelist
channel.description: Recent content in Compression on IEvangelist

item.title: ASP.NET Core Response Optimization
item.description: Intro If you’re a web developer, chances are you’re familiar with optimization strategies such as static file caching and response compression. I recently implemented these two concepts in tandem on an ASP.NET Core application that I have been developing… I’m going to share what I have learned. If you haven’t had a chance to use ASP.NET Core yet, you’re missing out! As my friend Scott Addie likes to say:
